dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 5139 IH: Fighting Their Fraud Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Craig introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce

form.official-title: To amend the Richard B. Russell National School Lunch Act to increase the fine for certain fraudulent activities related to funds for child nutrition programs, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Fighting Their Fraud Act of 2023.

section.header: Prevention of fraud under child nutrition programs
section.text: Section 12(g) of the Richard B. Russell National School Lunch Act (42 U.S.C. 1760(g)) is amended by striking $25,000 and inserting $50,000.
